description:
Job Title: Vice President of Purchasing Location: Fort Myers, FL

Position Overview: Seeking an experienced VP of Purchasing to lead our purchasing department in Fort Myers, FL. This role will oversee all procurement activities, manage supplier relationships, and ensure cost-effective purchasing of materials for our homebuilding projects.
Key Responsibilities:
  • Lead and manage the purchasing team, ensuring alignment with company goals.
  • Develop and execute purchasing strategies to secure quality materials at the best prices.
  • Establish and maintain strong vendor relationships, negotiate contracts, and monitor supplier performance.
  • Oversee purchasing budgets and implement cost control measures.
  • Collaborate with construction and finance teams to ensure timely material delivery.
  • Continuously improve purchasing processes and integrate technology solutions.

Qualifications:
  • Bachelor’s degree in Business, Supply Chain, or related field; MBA preferred.
  • 8+ years in purchasing, with 5+ years in a leadership role in homebuilding.
  • Strong negotiation skills and experience with large-scale projects.
  • Knowledge of construction materials and market trends.
  • Excellent leadership and communication skills.

Compensation:
  • Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.
  • Comprehensive benefits package.
  • Opportunities for professional growth.
